definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

pinyin: zhi2 xian4 xing4 jia1 su4 qi4

sentences.english: Coriolis acceleration is a nodus in general mechanics.
sentences.chinese: 科里奧利加速度在普通物理力學中是一難點。

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先進航空學將會改變阿波羅和艦載機的加速器顏色。

sentences.english: The USSR was so proud of the synchrophasotron.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯是如此爲這個加速器而自豪。

sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 結論肢體制動加速了失神經支配肌肉萎縮的發展。

sentences.english: EG:Another effort entails bringing the entire community into the post-ColdWar era.
sentences.chinese: 大家也在努力使整個智囊團進入加速冷戰時期。

sentences.english: The motion has a distinct realistic quality, as the objects first accelerate and then decelerate.
sentences.chinese: 動作顯得很逼真，選擇的控件先是加速，再略略減慢。

sentences.english: Therefore, the acceleration is an important criteria Check Valves for buying a car.
sentences.chinese: 所以，加速性是買車的一個重要考慮條件。

sentences.english: Strengthens their exporting ability and speeds their economy forward.
sentences.chinese: 擴大出口能力，加速經濟發展。

sentences.english: The orientation and accelerometer sensors each provide three data values.
sentences.chinese: 方向和加速表傳感器都提供三個數據值。

sentences.english: The truck speeded up after it left town.
sentences.chinese: 卡車在離開城鎮之後加速。

sentences.english: The initial acceleration is due to the strong shock-related magnetic field compression.
sentences.chinese: 開始的加速是由於強激波相關的磁場壓縮導致的。

sentences.english: He beat time on the accelerator .
sentences.chinese: 他用腳在加速器上打拍子。

sentences.english: In addition, the design of labyrinth and the two protection doors in cyclotron rooms were conservative.
sentences.chinese: 迴旋加速器室兩道防護門和迷道長度的設計是保守的。

sentences.english: Don't accelerate too slowly in hybrid and keep batteries charged
sentences.chinese: 混合動力車加速不要過慢，保持電池在充滿電狀態。

sentences.english: A molecule striking an advancing piston recoils with increased speed.
sentences.chinese: 撞在前進中的活塞上的分子，會加速反跳。

sentences.english: This dynamic difference mainly in the acceleration of the high-speed section.
sentences.chinese: 這種動力性的差別主要表現在高速段的加速性上。

definition: to increase the specified cruising speed/to pick up speed/to speed up
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
